cryo_chamber.name: Cryo-Chamber
cryo_chamber.description: Frost-etched glass surrounds your pod. Neon flickers above.

hallway.name: Dim Hallway
hallway.description: Exposed wires hiss with static electricity.

observation_deck.name: Observation Deck
observation_deck.description: A massive window overlooks the glowing ring of a gas giant.
